+ [SatRday](https://amsterdam2018.satrdays.org/) **Aug 31-Sept 1**
Amsterdam, the Netherlands.
+ [LatinR 2018](http://latin-r.com/) **Sept 4-5**
Buenos Aires, Argentina.
+ [Econometrics and Statistics using R](http://gades-training.com/en/cursos/Econometrics-and-Statistics-Using-R) **Sept 10-14**
Lisbon, Portugal.
